doc:
Joel Berti https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joel_Berti 0 Joel Berti (born December 17, 1971) is an American actor acting coach and photographer. He is best known for his role as William Chandler on MyNetworkTV telenovela, Fashion House. He is the brother of Chiara Jude Berti, born in New York City, New York in 1977, who appeared on Season 3 of Big Brother, for which she created some dramatic content. Recently he was Lady Gaga's acting coach for American Horror Story: Hotel where she went on to win the 2016 Golden Globe for best performance in a limited series. Joel_Berti ( born December_17 , 1971 ) is an_American_actor_acting_coach and photographer . He is_best_known for his_role as William_Chandler on MyNetworkTV_telenovela , Fashion_House . He is the_brother of Chiara_Jude_Berti , born in New_York_City , New_York in 1977 , who appeared on Season_3 of Big_Brother , for which she created some_dramatic_content . Recently he was Lady_Gaga 's_acting_coach for American_Horror_Story : Hotel where she went on to_win the_2016_Golden_Globe_for_best_performance in a_limited_series .
